name: Porfirio Díaz
what_did:
Díaz ruled Mexico for over 30 years.
He helped bring railways, factories, and new ideas to the country.
But many people were poor under his rule, and protests eventually forced him to leave.
why_matters:
Porfirio Díaz changed Mexico with big modernization projects.
He also showed what happens when one person has too much power for too long.
His rule helped lead to the Mexican Revolution.

questions.q: What did Díaz build in Mexico?

fun_fact: Díaz once studied to become a priest before joining the army!
